en.title: Dr Emoto Seminar Attended By 3,000 In Manila!
en.content:
REPORT BY PHILIPPINES COUNTRY LICENSEE PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR JEREMY LOOI.FE's Dr Masaru Emoto's Seminar held at the Philippines Convention Center, Manila on Saturday 10th April 2010 was a HUGE SUCCESS with 3,000 attendees. This is double the crowd from the previous year's Emoto Seminar in Manila! A BIG Thank You to all FE Leaders from all over Philippines who made it happened! 

Highlights Of The Event Include:

- Opening and Welcome Speech by Founder Director KS Lee.
   
- Dr Amir Farid's talk on "What Is Scalar Energy?"
   
- Dr Masaru Emoto's Keynote Lecture "The Power of Scalar Energized Water".
   
- Demonstrations on the power of FE's Quantum Pendant by Presidential Director Pastor Art Medina and Presidential Director Cap Eliseo Demafalis. The majority of the audience were first timers and they were very impressed by the demonstrations!   
   
- Lucky Draws of a Brand New Honda City, 2 iPads (Hot from USA and donated by Country Licensee Jeremy Looi and Presidential Director Pastor Art Medina) and 10 Quantum Watches.  
   

Dr Amir Farid Ishak is the Founding President of Guolin Qigong Association Malaysia and is a respected Qigong Master and Reiki Master. Dr Amir has a weekly column on health in the Malaysian Star Newspaper. He enlightens so many of us with his simplistic explanation of scalar energy and its benefits. Dr Masaru Emoto the world-renowned water scientist and author of  “Messages From Water”, “The Hidden Messages in Water” shared with us his findings on the power of scalar energized water using our products. He also shared about his extensive research of water around the world that led to the discovery that water in frozen crystal form shows its true nature. The world stood in awe of his incredible findings of that water has memory and words be it verbal or written can affect it!

This time the attendance was 3,000, twice that of the previous seminar by Dr Emoto in Manila. It reflects the growth of the Philippines in such a short span of time.
 
Despite her extremely hectic campaigning schedules, aspiring Senator candidate Imelda Papin, took time out to thrill the crowd with a high energy song "One" which emphasizes on unity and love. We are so honored to have you with us Senator Papin and fellow Filipinos - do remember her senator ballot number is 42 in the coming general elections! 

We had seen numerous Lifting Tests using our Quantum Pendant but having the biggest and heaviest person, a 6 foot 3 inches 260 pounds visiting American FE distributor (Michael) by 2 ladies in their 50s and 60s is a real challenge to our products and guess what. They lifted him nevertheless! Aren't FE products INCREDIBLE!!!
 
Founding Director KS Lee's Opening and Welcoming Speech was laced with his witty humor as usual and had the audience's ribs tickled.

Presidential Director Pastor Medina's sharing emphasized on the importance of flushing out daily (The Goal Is To Max Out Everyday!) and conditioning the mindset to achieve nothing less than that goal. 

Country Licensee Presidential Director Jeremy Looi reminded the audience that the best way to predict the future is to create it. With FE as the vehicle, elevating the quality of life of you and your family is within one's hand. He took shared 2 short but high impact videos that afternoon (below is the hyperlink): 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kQhWh9I8Ec0

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q65Ef2xBz_4
 
 
The lucky Winner for the Brand New Honda City is Executive Director Nickolas De Leon who won an iPad too! GOD was smiling upon him that day indeed! He is very encouraged with this recent events and will be taking Paul Ting's advice and going full time into FusionExcel's business. See You At The Top!

bm.title: Dr Emoto Seminar Attended By 3,000 In Manila!
